import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Form, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { createBill } from '../../redux/actions/bill/billAction' import Bill from '../Bill/Bill' function AddBill() { const [productKey, setProductKey] = useState(" ") const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(0) const dispatch = useDispatch(); const formSubmitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(createBill(productKey, quantity)) } return (
Product Key setProductKey(e.target.value)} /> Quantity setQuantity(e.target.value)} />
) } export default AddBill
